Art. 4.238. 
Gifts by matrimonial agreement by a minor 
A minor may, by matrimonial agreement, give to the other spouse, either by simple gift or by reciprocal gift, only with the assistance of his or her father and mother or one of them or, failing this, with the authorisation of the family court.
With this assistance or authorisation, he may give everything that the law allows a spouse of full age to give to the other spouse.
